title: [Health] Deleting a protein might reduce cardiovascular disease: Deleting a Protein, called TRPM2, could prevent inflammation and potentially prevent heart attacks and strokes in humans

[Neuroscience] A new study led by UCLA Health scientists shows highly creative people's brains appear to work differently from others', with an atypical approach that makes distant connections more quickly by bypassing the "hubs" seen in non-creative brains
